name: Soul Dossier
description:
As a genuine sequel to 《Notes Of Soul》, the game is designed based on the all-embracing Chinese traditional culture, integrating the five elements of gossip, folk customs and a large number of unique oriental cultural elements, so that players can personally experience the charm of Chinese traditional culture.
You will act as an agent of Psychic Bureau of investigation and embark on an immersive adventure.

the adventure

In order to protect the human world, the exorcists from various schools, with the help of the mysterious power of the wild universe, drive the circulation of Yin, Yang, five elements and two diagrams, and build a boundary system all over the world,which name is "the Boundary Tablet" of the five elements and eight diagrams. Thousands of years later, in 2020, the boundary tablet gradually showed signs of loosening, and grievances with obsession appeared all over the world. As a new agent in Psychic Bureau of investigation, you will be responsible for maintaining human stability.


LingJing

The virtual reality system, Lingjing, which is developed by the Psychic Investigation Bureau, can read the memory fragments of other agents and project a virtual three-dimensional world. Here you will play the role of Ling Tan or Yuan Ling to carry out simulation training to improve actual combat experience.

environment

Ling Jing can simulate any scene, you can place yourself in the antique national style temple scene "Brahma Secret Courtyard", or go to the office building in the strange city. The murmur of chanting from the secret courtyard,the sound of the keyboard tapping that fell on its own in the empty office building. Players can immersively cooperate with their teammates to defend against enemies or fight against Yuan Ling in different scenes.

Ling Tan

In order to deal with the upcoming Yuan Ling crisis, you can participate in the simulation training in the Ling Jing, which stores a lot of combat data of your predecessors, and you can use their special abilities to help you complete the training. Of course, as a Ling Tan, the use of props is indispensable, you will have the opportunity to use traditional soul-sealing props and other unique auxiliary props, and even have the opportunity to use the most cutting-edge technology of system simulation. With a heavy responsibility, can you successfully complete your training and escape from the pursuit of Yuan Ling?

Yuan Ling

As the saying goes, "only by knowing yourself and the enemy can you be invincible in a hundred battles." you can also play the resentful spirits in the legend, and gradually learn the weakness of Yuan Ling in the training. Personally experience the domineering pursuit pleasure as a Yuan Ling, using the unique skills of each resentful spirit to prevent the Yuan Ling from sealing the Wu Xing Boundary Tablet, and even put the Ling Tan into an embarrassing situation.

game features

The way of playing with traditional culture

We put the "five elements theory", "three souls and seven spirits" and other traditional culture into the game world through ingenious design, creating a unique way of play, you will feel the unique charm of traditional culture in the process of playing.

unique role design

In order to design the characters with their own characteristics, we refer to the crape myrtle disk in the traditional ghost culture and numerology, and make the most suitable design according to the image characteristics of the character itself, and we will shape the soul of the character more deeply. so that players can experience the distinct characteristics of each character.

classical Chinese art

The traditional art effect collides with many bizarre scenes, creating a world of soul exploration with a unique style.
You will return to the bizarre Brahma secret courtyard, the anecdote office building.
Experience the immersive game experience brought to you by different scenes.

prop system for fun play

Soul-sealing props have been making progress with the development of the times. in the game, not only traditional instruments such as "Soul charm", "SanQingLing" and "Feng Shui compass" can be used to dispel Yuan Ling, but also with the support of science and technology, Ling Tan can also use unique and fun modern equipment such as "night vision instrument", "flash bomb" and "screaming chicken".

leisure and relaxed home play

In the game, each player has his own home, players can design and decorate their own home, but also can invite friends to visit their home. Not only that, We have also prepared leisure games such as planting, mining, treasure hunting and so on. While playing easily, you can also gain unexpected fun at the same time, this process will also randomly drop important materials that can enhance their own strength. I hope all players can also feel the warmth brought to you by the Tan Ling world in addition to the fierce game.
